title: Appeal Sub-Status
description: Sub-status values for appeal processing workflow as defined by Availity QRE requirements. These sub-statuses provide granular tracking of appeal lifecycle stages.

enumDescriptions.AWAITING_CLASSIFICATION: Appeal has been received and is awaiting initial classification by the health plan
enumDescriptions.CASE_ASSIGNED: Appeal has been classified and assigned to a reviewer or case manager
enumDescriptions.IN_CLINICAL_REVIEW: Appeal is currently undergoing clinical review by medical personnel
enumDescriptions.IN_PROGRESS: Appeal is actively being processed (general processing state)
enumDescriptions.NEED_ADDITIONAL_INFO: Appeal processing is paused pending receipt of additional information from provider or member
enumDescriptions.PENDING_ASSIGNMENT: Appeal is in queue awaiting assignment to a reviewer
enumDescriptions.PENDING_PAYMENT: Appeal has been approved and payment processing is pending
enumDescriptions.REQUEST_RECEIVED: Initial state when appeal request is first received by the system

subStatusTransitions.description: Valid state transitions for appeal sub-statuses
